version_description:
Thanks for playing Toca Life: Vacation!
In this version: minor tweaks. More fixes to come soon.

We added a surprise - one person now has sunglasses - can you find who it is?

Thanks for playing Toca Life: Vacation!

Bug fixes: We’ve worked on bug fixes and overall improvements in this version.

New things: We also added some fun stuff!
● 2 more baby outfits in white and purple — look for them in the hotel
● A frying pan for the hotel restaurant
... and we've moved the pirate costumes to the box with the pirate bandana.

If you enjoy playing with Toca Life: Vacation, please leave us a review. If something is not working quite right, feel free to reach out to us on support@tocaboca.com

Thanks for playing Toca Life: Vacation!

In this update we fixed the trash system. You can now enjoy throwing items (and animals, oops!) off the balcony, just like the old days.
That's about it!

If you enjoy playing with Toca Life: Vacation, please leave us a review. If something is not working quite right, feel free to reach out to us on support@tocaboca.com

Your favorite app has been updated!
• Life Weekly got a makeover and is now Toca Life MIX! Your source for everything happening in Toca Life. Check out the latest news, watch cool videos and vote in fun polls.
• Everyone can wear towels!
• And of course, we’ve fixed some bugs!
